p: Eliminating factors that weaken immune system. Our group has recently examined thousands of article Abstracts identifying factors that weaken the immune system. We have identified hundreds of factors (depending on how they are aggregated) that contribute to weakening the immune system ( 29). The complete study showing all the factors identified will be posted online by 20 June 2020 ( https://smartech.gatech.edu/handle/1853/62907).
